Articles.Content:
You send a request via pm and add your email so I can send the file to me and ill build the car or post a tutorial on the car. and i cant build anything to big. for cars I'm putting a limit to 250 parts (not including struts). when you send a request please including what type of car like armored not armored fast or slow and other things like if you want a ATV type car or a boat car. I'm new to KSP forums and i would include pictures but i cant figure out how the max it will take is 7 days (a week) the minimum is 3 days, mostly because I have to design it to your specs and it will most likely be day the day after the request or not.. Spaceships I also build spaceships and shuttles like in star wars or like in battle star galactic. I will be on forums from 4:00 pm to 7:00 pm on Mondays to Fridays on Saturday to Sunday ill be on from 11:00 am to 8:00 pm.

I will be doing showcases for my public files on my YouTube start December 1rst

ATV public file: [Modedit: Adfly link removed]

Edited May 9, 2015 by technicalfool
Adfly link removed
